structure.unit: Executive And Administrative Officers Of The Commonwealth
The Governor, Lieutenant Governor And Council, Certain Officers Under The Governor And Council, And State Library

law.text: [ Text of section effective until July 1, 2011. For text effective July 1, 2011, see below.] The governor shall annually issue a proclamation setting apart the month of October as Lupus Awareness Month and recommending that said month be observed in an appropriate manner by the people.[ Text of section as amended by 2011, 68, Sec. 4 effective July 1, 2011. See 2011, 68, Sec. 221. For text effective until July 1, 2011, see above.] The governor shall annually issue a proclamation setting apart the month of May as Lupus Awareness Month and recommending that said month be observed in an appropriate manner by the people.
